titleStmt.title: Letter from Nancy Violette Cunningham to Eartha M. M. White. Novumber 30, 1929.
titleStmt.author: Nancy Violette Cunningham

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Author writes to inform White of a death and to ask for a reply to her letters.

objectDesc.p: A handwritten letter of two pages from Nancy to White on the death of a figure in a local church, dated 11/30/1929.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.p:
Am just back from Trus.Trustee
Owen's funeral and heard four
telegramtelegrams read. I was just over
to see her the last of last month
and how it had preyed on any
my mind to call her but last
week but neglected doing
so and then she passed before
I could get back to see her.

She hasn't been a well wom
an for some time but wasn't
carried to her bed or home
for only a short while less than
a month even.

Bishop Carey and all of Thethe Ministersministers
of the city (A.M.E.African Methodist Episcopal) were present and spoke
as well as Senator Roberts (CalCalifornia); Judge
Lupe, in whose court we went that
day - Court of domestic relations;
and Judge George and many

It is bitter cold here - six below
and that had to do with the crowd
being as small as it was althoalthough
the church (Lerim ChapellChapel) was
was two thirdstwo-thirds full and the
flowers beautiful.

Her passing is to be regretted
because of her usefulness and
her exemplary Christian life.

I can't imagine, Eartha,
why your folks don't write
me. What evil have I done that
you should exclude me so
completely? Did you all ever get
your pictures and where is mine?

Sydney is working doing fairly
well. I hope you are well, Eartha,
and that things are moving along
smoothly for you.

closer.salute:
Much love and kindest thotsthoughts
to you and B.H + Lovingly,
